content:
Proved IsCyclotomicExtension.isMulCommutative that any cyclotomic extension (of rings) is abelian.

Deprecated IsCyclotomicExtension.Aut.commGroup which is CommGroup and only adjoins one root of unity. Now CommGroup instance should be inferred automatically if IsMulCommutative is provided (the preferred spelling of abelian extension, see https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/23669#issuecomment-2849132297).
Can you please ask my review? (On mobile right now)
